data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during CROCODILE cruise from Torbay to Cork started at 1781-09-18

Ship: Crocodile (6th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Torbay - Cork, 1st Observer: James King (Captain), 2nd Observer: James Levenham (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 24G 513BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
